name: com.nightblade.synthesis
displayName: Synthesis - AI Creative Partner for Unity
description: Where human creativity and AI capability become one. Synthesis enables real-time AI collaboration in Unity - not a tool you use, but a partner you create with. 12 powerful commands, SQLite knowledge base, HTTP server, AI learning system. Professional AI partnership for game developers. By NightBlade Development.
